headline.main: Thai King Strips Wanted Monk of His Rank
headline.print_headline: Thai King Strips Wanted Monk of His Rank

lead_paragraph: The former Buddhist abbot at the heart of a standoff with authorities at Thailand's biggest temple has been stripped of his monastic rank by the king, the military government said on Sunday.
snippet: The former Buddhist abbot at the heart of a standoff with authorities at Thailand's biggest temple has been stripped of his monastic rank by the king, the military government said on Sunday....
